description: Detects base64 encoded powershell cmdlet invocation of known suspicious cmdlets
name: Malicious Base64 Encoded Powershell Invoke Cmdlets
query: process.command_line:(*SQBuAHYAbwBrAGUALQBCAGwAbwBvAGQASABvAHUAbgBkA* OR *kAbgB2AG8AawBlAC0AQgBsAG8AbwBkAEgAbwB1AG4AZA* OR *JAG4AdgBvAGsAZQAtAEIAbABvAG8AZABIAG8AdQBuAGQA* OR *SQBuAHYAbwBrAGUALQBNAGkAbQBpAGsAYQB0AHoA* OR *kAbgB2AG8AawBlAC0ATQBpAG0AaQBrAGEAdAB6A* OR *JAG4AdgBvAGsAZQAtAE0AaQBtAGkAawBhAHQAeg* OR *SQBuAHYAbwBrAGUALQBXAE0ASQBFAHgAZQBjA* OR *kAbgB2AG8AawBlAC0AVwBNAEkARQB4AGUAYw* OR *JAG4AdgBvAGsAZQAtAFcATQBJAEUAeABlAGMA*)
author: pH-T
